description: Listed Building Application for repair and conservation works to include External Works: Repairs to brickwork; cleaning of brickwork; Re-pointing works (including removal of modern cementitious mortar to be re-instated in lime mortar); Repair and restoration works to sash windows; Removal of modern air-bricks/grilles and reinstatement with re-claimed bricks; Lead capping to eastern parapet; New rainwater down pipe and hopper; Repair works to roof and replacement of windows to modern 'lean-to' structure at rear of property and Internal works: Restoration and repair of original joinery and features; Repairs to internal walls/ plasterwork and redecoration; Flood resilience and damp proofing works throughout ground floor area; Internal reconfiguration to improve accessibility and provide ancillary facilities to support use of spaces as workspace; Works to improve fire safety (renewal of doors and replacement of ceilings at ground floor); New building services throughout the building.
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
15/00251/LBC 29th May 2015: A listed building application for a temporary change of use and internal alterations at the Custom House. This application was approved 14th April 2016.

15/00243/FUL 12th June 2015: A planning application for a temporary change of use and internal alterations at the Custom House. This application was approved 14th April 2016.
